Pathing Procedures for Buybacks Cc a buyback MOP Supply List with an existing Market Deal typically baseload please follow these steps Theory Example Supply Deal d Market Deal d Attach the Supply Deal with the Market Deal to establish a buysell path list contract oppose to a transport contract Path the transaction on the buysell or broker the deal contract This process is applicable only if the Supply Deal and the Market Deal are the same quantity This example will yield a net zero activity in POP Theory Example Supply Deal d Market Deal d Follow steps in Theory Additionally create a service transportation contract ie K in the path list Path on the buysell path list contract and on the transport ie K contract This procedure will eliminate an outofbalance in MOP for both the Supply Deal and the Market Deal and send to POP via xport K Note Never path a buyback Supply Deal using a receipt transport contact and the Market Deal using a delivery transport contract POPs should only reflect the net on these two transactions buyback and baseload deal
